attributes.action: Dual Carriageway the A40 from Witney to Oxford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This stretch of road takes approximately 30-45 mins to travel along at peak periods which is diabolical for only about a 10 mile section. It desperately needs action undertaken to relieve the massive congestion as the West of Oxfordshire continues to be urbanised with no infrastructure improvements.
